name: 'NES'
blurb: The first of a trilogy of Nintendo albums arranged in the style of synth-infused jazz.

rewards.reward: You will receive my eternal gratitude for your support.
Thank you much! Take your pick of 3 of your favorite tunes that you want to listen to sent in a digital format.
Thanks a bunch! You will receive a digital copy of the album including printable artwork and liner notes.
You are awesome. For your support you will receive the full physical album. I know you're going to love it!
Wow, you have really helped out this project. Thank you! You will receive a physical copy of the album and a sweet poster too!

What is going on here? Are you sure? Well, for this much support you will receive a physical copy of the cd, plus the poster, plus pdf's of the scores as well as etchings of the beginning stages of each tune. A little behind the scenes for ya ;)

You are so incredibly generous! Not only will you receive the physical copy of the album, a poster, printed copies of the scores, and printed copies of the etchings of the beginning stages of the tunes, but you will also receive credits in the album for your incredible support.

Are you sure you're in the right place? This is a lot to pledge! Well if you pledge this much you're not only going to get the physical copy of the album, a poster, printed copies of the scores, printed copies of the etchings of the beginning stages of the tunes, and credits in the album, you're also going to get a booklet that I've written diving into detail about how each tune came to be. I will discuss my many compositional secrets and even give you tips for how to cover your own video game tunes!

You can't be serious. You realize how much this is right? Well if you pledge this much you're not only going to get physical copy of the album, a poster, printed copies of the scores, printed copies of the etchings of the beginning stages of the tunes, credits in the album, and the compositional booklet, you're also going to get a 90 minute video chat music lesson from me at your own convenience. Whether it be theory, composition, or piano I'm willing to teach you my tricks that I've learned over my years of music school. Heck! If you wanted, we could just nerd out over video games too!

You are nuts. You really are out of your mind to be pledging this much. Your reward for pledging this much needs to be treated with passion and sincerity. Along with receiving a physical copy of the album, a poster, printed copies of the scores, printed copies of the etchings of the beginning stages of the tunes, credits in the album, the compositional booklet, and a 90-minute video chat music lesson, you will also have a song written for you. This song can literally be anything you want. It can be about a specific topic or you can make me sing about my love for you or about your love for me. There doesn't have to be words if you want! You can pick the instruments, words, etc. This is your personal song that I write for you in gratitude. It will be professionally mixed and mastered and will be sent to you directly. I will also post the song all over my social media as well as youtube so that all may know of your generosity.

You are insane. You are my hero. If you make this pledge you not only get a physical copy of the album, a poster, printed copies of the scores, printed copies of the etchings of the beginning stages of the tunes, credits in the album, the compositional booklet, and a 90-minute video chat music lesson, but you get to pick any tune from your favorite NES game and I will arrange it for the album. I will even give a shout out to your name at the beginning of the tune so you will live on forever in this recording. You will also have specific credits to funding the tune. You will also have my absolute most humble gratitude. Truly, you will be my hero.
